data.Title: Google Overhauls Video SEO Documentation
data.Description: Google has overhauled its video SEO documentation to vastly clarify the video indexing criteria and technical requirements. Plus, Google added a new watch page section to the document and expanded the examples in the document.

data.Title: Google May Now Use Open Graph Title Tag for Title Links
data.Description: Google adds og:title to sources for generating search result titles, expanding use of Open Graph data beyond social media.

data.Title: Google Says Low-Quality Traffic Can't Impact Rankings
data.Description: Google's Martin Splitt explains why low-quality traffic cannot have an effect on the trustworthiness of a website

data.Title: Google August 2024 Core Update Sees Helpful Content Surge
data.Description: This Google August 2024 core update has been shaking things up since it began to rollout.  We saw some early signs of some sites hit by the September 2023 helpful content see some signs of life. Then some saw reversals of sorts, but maybe that was the search ranking bug that got fixed a few days later. Here are some charts a week or so after the August core update was released.

data.Title: Survey: Google Updates, Self-Preferencing, AI Overviews are Top SEO Threats
data.Description: To counter these threats, SEOs are focusing on content quality, E-E-A-T, traffic diversification and staying updated.

data.Title: Google Tests New Default Favicon Designs
Google Business Profile Appeals are Super Delayed
Reframing SEO: Why Training Search Engines is the New Game in the Age of AI
data.Description: SEO isn't dead, but 'optimization' might be. Here’s why 'search engine training' better reflects our interactions with AI-powered search.

data.Title: Microsoft Bing Copilot Blames Reporter for Crimes He Covered
data.Description: Hallucinating AI models excel at defamation

data.Title: TikTok Enables Users to Create Their Own AI Voiceover Voice
data.Description: TikTok’s now enabling users to create AI simulations of their own voice in the app, so that you can voice over your TikTok clips with your own…

data.Title: Want to Turn Off AI Overviews in Google Search?
data.Description: AI Overview functionality is now available in the UK, following early tests in the USA

data.Title: Gannett is Shutting Down Reviewed
data.Description: Gannett was accused of publishing AI-generated products reviews on the site (a subdomain of USAToday). “After careful consideration and evaluation of our Reviewed…

data.Title: Netflix Still Struggling to Get Advertisers On Board
data.Description: Netflix is currently left offering modest scale in terms of reach, high CPMs, limited targeting capabilities and little in the way of measurement, at least for now.
